title: JetHost.com Launches AI-Powered Platform to Make Complex Web Technologies Simple for Small Businesse
description: MIAMI, FL – JetHost.com, a web hosting provider founded on a 20+ year track record of industry expertise, today announced its strategic commitment to integrating advanced Artificial Intelligence across its core platform. title: Philippines launches National AI Strategy
description: THE Department of Science and Technology (DOST) kicked off its 1st National Artificial Intelligence Strategy (Naisph) on Monday, a conference that presented its vision of an AI-driven future to government officials, industry leaders, academics and civil society representatives.

title: OpenAI partners with Broadcom to design its own AI chips
description: OpenAI said Monday it is working with chipmaker Broadcom to design its own artificial intelligence computer chips.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — OpenAI said Monday it is working with chipmaker Broadcom to design its own artificial intelligence computer chips.

title: Squawk Box co-host warns of similarities between today and Wall Street in 1929: ‘I can assure you, unfortunately, we will have a crash’

content:

title: Microsoft to bring AI to WA classrooms amid urban, rural tech divide
description: Microsoft will supply its artificial intelligence technology to every public school district and community college in Washington next year, part of a nationwide campaign to spread AI training and usage.

title: Pew: Most US workers don’t use AI in their job, but the number is growing
description: About 21% of U.S. workers use artificial intelligence, or AI, to do at least some part of their job, according to a new report by the Pew Research Center — and that number is only growing. Younger and more educated workers are more likely they are to use AI. Last year, 16% of workers surveyed said at least some of their work is done using AI.
